Aug. 20, 1932 D Orpington Contest (Third Section)
Orpington Contest (Third Section) 30 Test Piece Contest Orpington Contest orpington-contest-third-section
None
La Traviata [arr. Round]
Priory Grounds, Orpington, Kent Prizes: 3 guineas, 2 guineas, 1 guinea Brass Band News September 1932 shows result as - 1st Tottenham, 2nd Betteshanger, 3rd House of Dickenson. 8 bands competed.
Feb. 22, 2015, 12:28 p.m. Dec. 12, 2016, 7:32 p.m.
